Assassin.note: The amplifier is calculated additively since Patch 9.14.1b (nerf)

effects.effect: Dragons gain 83% Resistance to Magic Damage

Spatula.effect: Used to craft special items. When combined with another item, doubles that other items' stat power.
Spatula.effectShort: Doubles the stat power of the other, 2nd item.

Hextech Gunblade.effect: Heal 33% of all damage dealt, except damage dealt from item effects

Sword of the Divine.effect: 7% chance each second to gain 100% crit chance for the remainder of the round

Spear of Shojin.effect: After the first spell cast: Attacks give 15% of maximum Mana
Spear of Shojin.effectShort: After 1st spell: Attacks give additional mana

Guardian Angel.effect: Upon death: Revive with 800HP after 2 seconds

Bloodthirster.effect: Heal for 50% of damage dealt by basic attacks

Zeke's Herald.effect: On Round Start: Adjacent allies two spaces to the left and right of the wearer gain 15% attack speed
Zeke's Herald.effectShort: On Round Start: +15% AS for 4 adjacent allies

Guinsoo's Rageblade.effect: On every Basic Attack: Gain an additional 5% attack speed. This effect stacks with no upper limit
Guinsoo's Rageblade.effectShort: Basic Attacks grant +5% AS, stacks infinitely

Luden's Echo.effect: Special Ability deals 200 magic damage to all adjacent enemies to target
Luden's Echo.effectShort: Ability deals additional 200 AoE magic damage

Locket of the Iron Solari.effect: On Round Start: The weaerer and adjacent allies two space to left and right gain a 250 Health shield for 4 seconds

Ionic Spark.effect: Enemies take 150 true damage whenever they cast their Special Ability
Ionic Spark.effectShort: Enemy Spells deal 150 true damage to caster

Morellonomicon.effect: Special Ability applies a burn for 5 seconds, dealing 4% of target's maximum health as true damage per second and preventing healing
Morellonomicon.effectShort: Ability applies burn and prevents healing

Rapid Firecannon.effect: Doubles attack range, basic attacks cannot miss

Statikk Shiv.effect: On every third Basic Attack: Deal 90 magic damage to the target and 3 additional enemies
Statikk Shiv.effectShort: Every 3rd attack: 90 magic damage to 4 enemies

Phantom Dancer.effect: Champion dodges all critical strikes. In other words: Take no damage from basic attacks AND abilities which critical strike
Phantom Dancer.effectShort: Take no damage from critical strikes

Cursed Blade.effect: On every Basic Attack: 20% chance to shrink the target, removing 1 star. Can reduce targets to 0 star.
Cursed Blade.effectShort: Basic attacks can shrink the target by one Star

Titanic Hydra.effect: Basic attacks deal 10% of your maximum Healthpoints as bonus damage to the target and the enemies standing behind
Titanic Hydra.effectShort: Basic attacks deal AoE damage in a cone

Seraph's Embrace.effect: After each Special Ability cast: Gain 20 mana

Frozen Heart.effect: Adjacent enemies have their Attack Speed reduced by 20%

Hush.effect: On every Basic Attack: 50% chance to silence the target for 3s
Hush.effectShort: Basic Attacks can silence the target

Redemption.effect: On 25% HP: Heals nearby allies for 1000 health after a short delay
Redemption.effectShort: On 25% HP: Heals nearby allies for 1000HP

Thornmail.effect: Reflect 100% of all physical damage mitigated from enemy basic attacks as magic damage back to the attacker

Sword Breaker.effect: On every Basic attack: 25% chance to disarm the target for 4s
Sword Breaker.effectShort: Basic Attacks can disarm the target

Red Buff.effect: Basic Attacks deal 2.5% of target's maximum Healthpoints as true damage per second and prevent healing on the target
Red Buff.effectShort: Deal burning true damage and prevent healing

Zephyr.effect: On Round Start: Banishes for 5 seconds the unit that point-mirrors the wielder placement on the other side of the board
Zephyr.effectShort: On Round Start: Banish an enemy for 5 seconds

Runaan's Hurricane.effect: On every Basic Attack: Attacks one extra targets with 75% of damage, but can apply on-hit effects
Runaan's Hurricane.effectShort: On every Basic Attack: Attacks 1 extra targets

Warmog's Armor.effect: Regenerates 6% of missing Healthpoints per second

Force of Nature.effect: Increases the Unit Cap for your board by one
